entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:49 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 04:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -9.3°C
Wind: NNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 8:23 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:23 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 8:23 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
